text:
Well it sounds like you're definitely heading in the right direction. I studied animation at university too, it really helped shape what I did going forward.

How are you finding university at the moment? I take it you're not going in for lectures?

University is quite difficult at the moment as we are trying to create a short film but don’t have all the supplies to finish it! But i’m freelancing animation for other groups at the moment to keep practicing. I do enjoy university though as many are very helpful with criticism
